remarks: The inverse of the group operation reverses the arguments.  Lemma 2.2.1(d) of [Herstein] p. 55.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Oct-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:

grpasscan1.2 $e |- N = ( inv ` G ) $.
